item.title: DIY - Turn an old PC into a powerful Firewall using OPNsense
item.author: Author
item.description: Today, I will show you how to build a powerful open source (FOSS) router secured with a dedicated firewall and its own IDS (Suricata) at no cost. Go get your old laptop or PC get follow this DIY ! First things first When I talk to someone about cybersecurity, I often hear the price argument coming up. “Yeah, if you want a real level of security, you need dedicated equipment, and it costs a lot of money, etc.
